DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.CurveId, T1.GroupingId, T1.CurveDescription, T5.value Currency, T6.id DiscountCurve, T7.value InterpolationVariable, T8.value InterpolationMethod, T9.value YieldCurveDayCounter, T1.Tolerance, T11.value Extrapolation FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode T5 ON T1.Currency = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T6 ON T1.DiscountCurve = T6.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesInterpolationVariableType T7 ON T1.InterpolationVariable = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesInterpolationMethodType T8 ON T1.InterpolationMethod = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T9 ON T1.YieldCurveDayCounter = T9.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T11 ON T1.Extrapolation = T11.value ORDER BY 1 ASC

field.name: Currency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Currency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: DiscountCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id DiscountCurve,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY id

field.name: InterpolationVariable
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value InterpolationVariable,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesInterpolationVariableType !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: InterpolationMethod
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value InterpolationMethod,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesInterpolationMethodType !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: YieldCurveDayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value YieldCurveDayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Extrapolation
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Extrapolation, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value
